content: {"name": "Salvation Army - Passaic", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Serves residents of Passaic county only", "email": "", "url": "https://easternusa.salvationarmy.org/new-jersey/passaic/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "550 Main Ave", "address_2": "", "city": "Passaic", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07055", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.858411, "longitude": -74.123056}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 779-1155", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Entrance by the Side Door"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}]}
